Articles.Content: I\'ve done a search and can\'t find an answer to this question. Is it possible to change the state of landing gear or legs for that matter when you\'re building? I want to put folded gear on a rover I\'m building. I know you control them individually when you launch and whatnot. Just wondering if you can switch gear/legs to folded/unfolded when you\'re building.

I don\'t think so. I\'ve been after an option like that as well - I even took a look in the part.cfg files to see if there was a parameter for that. Would certainly make things a lot easier, in certain construction situations.

Currently, animated parts can not be activated in the HAB/VAB. 

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

C7 has listed all the cgf parameters [here in this post](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=12568.msg195960#msg195960), there is a deployed state option that should do it, just add the relevant line.
